section.title: CIMI Model Quality Criteria
section.para: The following quality criteria have been proposed for all CIMI models:

listitem.para: Shall satisfy the URU principles â€“ that is, they will be:
Shall be clinically accurate as deemed by clinicians.
Shall be evidence-based, as demonstrated by peer reviewed studies whenever possible.
Shall be adequate to express required clinical statements when tested using use cases.
Shall be developed with robust versioning and review controls.

section.para: The application of these criteria to CIMI models will be assessed through clinical and technical reviews and through pilot implementations and revised as needed.
